title: USENSYS 26-zone model, MIP project
text: ⚠️ package development. US26MIP version USENSYS model developed Model Intercomparison Project (MIP) goal comparing capacity expansion models US power sector. project used common set assumptions data 26-region model, assembled PowerGenome Princeton’s Zero Lab. US26MIP package provides data, used project, model . organized R package intended used conjunction usensys energyRt packages.

what: Log a message to a file — log_message
title: Log a message to a file — log_message
text: Log message file

title: Log a message to a file — log_message
code: log_message(   log_file,   message,   context = NULL,   type = c("INFO", "ACTION", "WARNING", "ERROR"),   print_level = 1 )  init_log_file(   usensys_dir,   log_file = "log.txt",   case_id = NULL,   replace = FALSE )  delete_log_file(   usensys_dir = NULL,   log_file = file.path(usensys_dir, "log.txt") )

title: Log a message to a file — log_message
text: log_file character path log file message character message log context optional additional context log type character log type, one 'INFO', 'WARNING', 'ACTION', 'ERROR'

title: Log a message to a file — log_message
text: init_log_file(): Initialize log file delete_log_file(): Delete log file

title: Process capacity factors — mip_capacity_factors
text: Process capacity factors

title: Process capacity factors — mip_capacity_factors
code: mip_capacity_factors(   usensys_dir,   yaml_file = NULL,   VER_name_mask = "wind|solar|photovol|utilitypv|hydro|distributed",   NOT_VER_name_mask =     "heat|duty|nuclear|coal|gas|oil|biomass|waste|petrol|hydrogen|storage|batter|geothermal",   print_level = 1 )

title: Process capacity factors — mip_capacity_factors
text: usensys_dir character path USENSYS scenario directory. VER_name_mask character regular expressions identify VRE generators. Used identify "weather-dependent" generators, marked VRE GenX data (mostly hydroelectric). NOT_VER_name_mask character regular expressions exclude non-VRE generators VRE list identified VER_name_mask. print_level integer indicating level verbosity (0 = silent, 1 = print integer columns)

title: Mean capacity factors for each Resource by year. — mip_capacity_factors_mean
text: data.table mean capacity factors Resource year.

title: Process carbon CAP data — mip_carbon_cap
text: Ad-hoc function process carbon cap data. Reads data imported GenX data (data-raw/CO2_cap) "guesses" cap regional national. Saves processed data USENSYS model directory (data/CO2_cap). Hardwired MIP's 'CO2_cap' file structure. Changes number regional caps different file structure require changes function.

title: Process carbon CAP data — mip_carbon_cap
Process carbon CAP data — mip_carbon_cap

what: Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario — mip_write_yaml
title: Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario — mip_write_yaml
text: function creates YAML file specified parameters MIP case/scenario.

title: Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario — mip_write_yaml
code: mip_write_yaml(   usensys_dir = NULL,   yaml_file = file.path(usensys_dir, "mip_case.yml"),   title = "MIP case settings for the USENSYS model",   case_id = "CASE ID-NAME (REQUIRED)",   case_description = "CASE_DESCRIPTION (OPTIONAL)",   input_idx = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6),   YEARS = c(2027, 2030, 2035, 2040, 2045, 2050),   group_techs = FALSE,   group_fuels = FALSE,   use_short_names = TRUE,   invcost = FALSE,   correct_declining_bounds = TRUE,   drop_ver_no_cf = TRUE,   drop_cf_no_techs = TRUE,   drop_zero_capacity_no_build = TRUE,   vintage = FALSE,   calendar = "w52_h168",   subset_weeks = 0,   SDR = 0.02,   WACC = 0.05,   ESR = TRUE,   lostload = TRUE,   optimize_storage_duration = TRUE,   storage_full_year = FALSE,   early_retirement = FALSE,   CO2_cap_national = FALSE,   CO2_cap_regional = TRUE,   offshore_wind_min_capacity = TRUE,   backstop = TRUE,   RAMP = FALSE,   myopic = TRUE,   solver = "energyRt::solver_options$gams_gdx_cplex_barrier",   overwrite = FALSE,   print_level = 1 )

title: Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario — mip_write_yaml
text: yaml_file character: name YAML file create title character: title YAML file case_id character: name case/scenario, required field processing YAML file case_description character: description case/scenario input_idx numeric: indices input folders use (Inputs_p* GenX Inputs folder) YEARS numeric: actual years input folders group_techs logical: TRUE, removes zone identifier technology name group_fuels logical: TRUE, removes zone identifier fuel name use_short_names logical: TRUE (recommended), uses short names technologies fuels invcost logical: TRUE, overnight investment costs used GenX input files calculate annualized costs, FALSE, annualized costs used directly GenX input files (default) vintage logical: (experimental!) TRUE, year identifiers added technology names calendar character: calendar settings ("w52_h168" used MIP cases) subset_weeks numeric: number weeks subset (0 automatic detection) SDR numeric: social discount rate (used perfect foresight scenarios), default 0.02 (2%) MIP cases WACC numeric: weighted average cost capital, default 0.05 (5%) MIP cases ESR logical: TRUE, Renewable Portfolio Standard (RPS) used policy, used current policy scenarios lostload numeric: lost load penalty $/MWh (default 500) CO2_cap_national logical: TRUE, national CO2 cap used CO2_cap_regional logical: TRUE, regional CO2 cap used, used MIP current policy scenarios offshore_wind_min_capacity logical: TRUE, offshore wind minimum capacity requirement constraint added backstop numeric: backstop price $/CO2-ton (default 200) RAMP logical: (optional) TRUE, ramping constraints used myopic logical: TRUE, myopic solution used, FALSE, perfect solver character: solver settings energyRt format (default "energyRt::solver_options$gams_gdx_cplex_barrier")

title: Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario — mip_write_yaml
